#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int c;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        char a[101];
        cin>>a;
        c = 0;
        for(int i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
        {
            if(a[i]=='A'||a[i]=='D'||a[i]=='O'||a[i]=='P'||a[i]=='Q'||a[i]=='R')
                c++;
            else if(a[i]=='B')
                c = c + 2;
        }
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
